verbose_text: For example, the DEMG & DEG Ascl1 (also known as Mash1), which encodes a transcription factor essential to neuronal commitment and differentiation during embryogenesis XREF_BIBR, was highly and specifically expressed in NPCs, perhaps because of the increase of H3K4me2 and decrease of H3K27me3 modification of the CGIs in the 5'UTR region of this gene (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: Ascl1 (also known as Mash1), which encodes a transcription factor essential to neuronal commitment and differentiation during embryogenesis XREF_BIBR , was highly and specifically expressed
